ygData.subject: Looking good (Was:RE: Bards and rubicite)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bards should always look good, esp their corpses .  Personally I do not want or need any more rubicite.  Currently have Rubi boots and that is all.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>The only reason I want rubicite is that I graduated from the University of
>Alabama and the color of rubicite is our team color (crimson):-). The
>breastplate is the only piece I want. Combined with steel for all the
>other
>pieces, I think that would look pretty cool. Call me vain but with a CHR
>of
>115 it fits my character:-). Based on the horror stories I've read about
>camping for rubicite, must admit I do not look forward to ever doing it.
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
>Roll Tide!!
>Bama 40
>Gators 39

Bards should always look good, esp their corpses <g>. Personally I do not
want or need any more rubicite. Currently have Rubi boots and that is all.
Looks good with full visible steel except for gloves and helm.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
